Methods.method_description: Creates a new, reusable property list encoder with the default formatting settings.

params.param_description: The value to encode as a property list.

Methods.method_description: Returns a property list that represents an encoded version of the value you supply.
Methods.method_declar: func encode<Value>(_ value: Value) throws -> Data where Value : Encodable

Vars.var_description: A value that determines which property list format is used during encoding.
A dictionary you use to customize the encoding process by providing contextual information.
